attributes.action: Make selling of "child size" imitation sex dolls illegal in the united kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
This is a link to one article I've encountered 

http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/child-sex-dolls-size-girls-8243468
attributes.background: So it's been brought to my attention that "life like" imitation "real feel" sex dolls in the form and size of children from the age of 3 are being sold to perverts in the U.K. This will encourage pedophiles and put real children at risk we need to get these banned from the U.K. market asap
